PageTitle: display bgp error discard unnumbered peer interface
FuncDef: The display bgp error discard unnumbered peer interface command displays BGP errors of unnumbered BGP peers. The display bgp error discard unnumbered peer interface command displays BGP errors of unnumbered BGP peers.
CLIs: display bgp error discard unnumbered peer interface { <interface-name> | <IfType> <IFNum> }

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an interface name.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 characters.

Specifies an interface number.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display bgp error discard unnumbered peer interface 100GE 1/0/1
ExtraInfo: When a BGP fault occurs, run this command to check BGP error information. BGP error information includes peer error information, route error information, and resource threshold-crossing error information.
